data.name: Super Dungeon Master VX (Donationware)
data.detailed_description:
It's a test DLC

This is a test DLC file. Please feel free to ignore.


About the Game

HONESTLY, I'D FAR PREFER A REVIEW THAN FOR YOU TO DOWNLOAD THIS DLC :)

Ok so I made a mistake: I thought adding DLC would be a cool way to include Trading Cards - but no: trading cards can only be activated by setting up in-app purchases and cards are given for every $9.00 spent! The alternative would be to publish the main game at say 0.39p, etc.

Here's the thing: The DLC is useful in signposting the game in new-releases, and gives store-presence in sales... but DLC is thorny for me.
Anyway, Steamworks is interesting to figure out, but please this DLC is just a placeholder: do not purchase expecting anything... if in doubt, please WAIT until I figure this out.

So thanks for your time in reading this.

PLEASE DO NOT FEEL THE NEED TO DOWNLOAD THIS DLC - BUT FEEL FREE TO DOWNLOAD THE GAME OF COURSE, :)
https://store.steampowered.com/app/717190/Super_Dungeon_Master_VX_Quest_for_the_Firestaff/

data.short_description: This DLC contains nothing: please feel free to ignore.

fullgame.name: Super Dungeon Master VX: Quest for the Firestaff

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

data.legal_notice:
'Super Dungeon Master: Quest for the Firestaff' is (C) 2017 Dave Gumble and is a non-commerical action adventure game built using RPG-Maker VX Ace technologies.
All asset, music and scripting content is used with permission of original authors (where obtainable).
Game design, artwork, narrative and structure is original to Dave Gumble.
Engine is RPG Maker VX Ace, heavily scripted: all script owners and contributors are credited within game.

Dungeon Master original is (C) 1987 Software Heaven (FTL) - this game is an unofficial fan-game not officially endorsed by the original authors.

Content contains themes of fantasy violence, however explicit language, gore, blood, themes of a sexual nature are all omitted as is designed as a family-friendly entertainment.

RPG Maker VX Ace Engine (C) 2012 ENTERBRAIN, INC./YOJI OJIMA
